All apartments offer contemporary décor, with amenities including a flat-screen TV, DVD player, 12 cable channels and complimentary WiFi. Most rooms offer a large and airy living area, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities.

Onsite you can enjoy local specialties and a selection of international dishes at the onsite restaurant and bar - Q Manhattans. The bar serves selected wines and features regular piano performances. description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar, the modern Atura Albury is located 5 minutes’ walk from Albury Botanic Gardens. All refurbished guest rooms include satellite TV, designer furniture, a minibar and a work desk.

Centrally located off Dean st, a variety of shops, cafes and the local cinema are all within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. There are several wineries, nature reserves and golf resorts within a 30-minute drive. Free parking and free local phone calls are provided.

The air-conditioned rooms include a minibar and a coffee machine with free coffee pods. Each room features unique wallpaper designed by award-winning design agency Fabio Ongarado and Mr Smith amenities

Atura Albury Hotel also offers a range of conference and function rooms, along with a catering service. The stylish Roadhouse Bar & Grill offers dining set to a modern soundtrack. For those on the run or wanting a snack in the comfort of their room, a handy Grab ‘n’ Go shop is located next to reception and is open 24/7.

El Lake Hume Resort está situado a orillas del lago Hume, a 10 minutos del aeropuerto de Albury y a 15 minutos en coche de las ciudades gemelas de Albury y Wodonga.
